title: Fullbear2222
author: Fullbear2222
content: Whales discriminate the UK eu and russia nordic countries.On favoure more asia and USA time zone traders.AS in the world we live in gender equality Age and feminism and liberty so why it don't apply to the crypto whales ? All the biggest moves happening when UK nordic ru and EU traders Are sleeping.Who gona Fix that problem i know it's a cbot and comex who control Market with ICE benchmark exchangers but how to contact with them to make Market move one Week for other time zone and the other Week for the other time zone.Crypto definately needs a complain Center so i can send my complaints to them about any issues i have about crypto and btc generally and regards of the markets Im definately dont feel it's right to keep best crypto moves on favoure for USA
